resources.string: Incorrect PIN code, please try again!
No broadcast signals could be found. Please check your connection and scan again.
All previous settings will be deleted. Continue?
Are you sure you want to change the source?
Are you sure you want to reset to default settings?
This may change the features available on your TV. In some cases, all existing channels may be cleared. Continue?
To use the TV for displaying in a store showroom,\nplease select [Store]. [Home] mode is recommended\nfor normal use.
Intelligent AutoView mode automatically adjusts picture settings to suit ambient light conditions. Do you wish to enable Intelligent AutoView mode?
Press OK to Lock or Unlock

Input String Long XXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ ZZZZZZZZZZZZ ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ YYYYYYYYYYYYY YYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY YYYYYYYYYYYYYYY
USB device was connected to TV.
Do you want to open Media Player?
USB over current status detected. Please remove all USB devices from the TV, and restart the TV by removing the AC power.
To use the demo, please select [On]. For normal TV usage, please select [Off].
The software upgrade is complete! Please remove upgrade media. Your TV system will reboot after which you may resume normal viewing.
Software upgrade in progress, please wait... DO NOT unplug your TV! Doing so may corrupt the system making your TV inoperable.
USB device was connected to TV. Do you want to open Media Player?
The Automatic Power Down feature will switch the TV to standby momentarily.
Due to inactivity the TV will momentarily switch to standby to conserve energy.
The No Signal Power Down feature will switch the TV to standby in a moment.
You have selected [Store]. This mode consumes more energy. Are you sure you want to set to this mode?
Intelligent AutoView mode automatically adjusts picture settings to suit ambient light conditions. Do you wish to enable Intelligent AutoView mode?
The Automatic Power Down feature will switch the TV to standby in a moment.
A software upgrade is available. Do you wish to upgrade?
You do not have authorization to play this video.
You must register your device to play DivX? protected videos.
Your device is not authorized to play this DivX? protected video.
Are you sure you wish to deregister?
This DivX? rental has used X out of Y views.
USB over current status detected. Please remove all USB devices from the TV, and restart the TV by removing the AC power.
Logout at the same time as Power Off.
Please press the back key again to exit application.
Device is now in standby mode.
Resume playback is currently available for this file. However, if you press the Stop key again, the resume point will be lost.
Would you like to jump to another title?
There are more than maximum number of files. Some files cannot be displayed.
While connected to Miracast? other Netowork applications will not be available. Are you sure you want to start Miracast??
Enter the PIN into your device.
Ready for connection. To get started, launch Screen Mirroring on your device.
Connected to Screen Mirroring. Please wait.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Wi-Fi is not available while Screen Mirroring is during operation. Do you want to continue?
Please press the back key again to exit application.
PVR is not supported in current source
The time from TV source is not snynchronized with the system\nDo you want to update the system time setting?
There\'s already a timer at the same time.
Please disable timeshift before starting to record.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$d files.
Got new NIT.\nDo you want to scan channel again.
Erase the storage? You will lose all data on the storage!
The system is going to sleep in %d seconds.
